actions.text: Amendment SA 666 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
The point of order with respect to Amendment SA 666 was not sustained.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 666 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 57. Record Vote Number: 176.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 666.
Amendment SA 666 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S6443-6445, S6463-6475) To strike the section relating to qualified tax collection contracts.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 666 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 57. Record Vote Number: 176.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 666 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 666 proposed by Senator Dorgan.

purpose: To strike the section relating to qualified tax collection contracts.
